Implements a shadow and rounded corners for better visual hierarchy Let me know if you'd like any adjustments to the design or functionality!

messages.content:
<antArtifact identifier="horizontal-timeline" type="image/svg+xml" title="Interview Timeline July-November 2024">
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 1200 400">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="1200" height="400" fill="white"/>
  
  <!-- Timeline line -->
  <line x1="50" y1="200" x2="1150" y2="200" stroke="#CBD5E1" stroke-width="2"/>
  
  <!-- Month markers and labels -->
  <g id="months">
    <!-- July -->
    <line x1="100" y1="190" x2="100" y2="210" stroke="#475569" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="100" y="230" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">July</text>
    
    <!-- August -->
    <line x1="320" y1="190" x2="320" y2="210" stroke="#475569" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="320" y="230" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">August</text>
    
    <!-- September -->
    <line x1="540" y1="190" x2="540" y2="210" stroke="#475569" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="540" y="230" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">September</text>
    
    <!-- October -->
    <line x1="760" y1="190" x2="760" y2="210" stroke="#475569" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="760" y="230" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">October</text>
    
    <!-- November -->
    <line x1="980" y1="190" x2="980" y2="210" stroke="#475569" stroke-width="2"/>
    <text x="980" y="230" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">November</text>
  </g>

  <!-- Event markers -->
  <!-- July -->
  <g>
    <circle cx="100" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="100" y="170" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Basima (KESK)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="180" y="150" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Abdal (Grofin)</text>
  </g>

  <!-- August -->
  <g>
    <circle cx="280" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="280" y="170" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Yousif (MoE)</text>
    <circle cx="320" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="320" y="150" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Multiple Aug 13</text>
    <circle cx="360" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="360" y="170" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Lafarge</text>
    <circle cx="400" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="400" y="150" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Multiple Aug 18-28</text>
  </g>

  <!-- September -->
  <circle cx="540" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
  <text x="540" y="170" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Sika</text>

  <!-- October -->
  <g>
    <circle cx="700" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="700" y="170" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">ITC</text>
    <circle cx="760" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="760" y="150" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Multiple Oct 23-31</text>
  </g>

  <!-- November -->
  <g>
    <circle cx="940" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="940" y="170" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Sustainability Meetups</text>
    <circle cx="1020" cy="200" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="1020" y="150" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Multiple Nov 6-11</text>
  </g>

  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="600" y="50" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold">BEIT Project Interview Timeline (July - November 2024)</text>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(50, 320)">
    <circle cx="10" cy="10" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="30" y="15" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="12">Interview/Meeting</text>
    <text x="0" y="40" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="11">Note: Multiple interviews on same/consecutive dates are grouped</text>
  </g>
</svg>
</antArtifact>

I've created a horizontal timeline as an SVG that:
1. Shows the progression of interviews from July to November 2024
2. Groups multiple interviews that occurred on the same or consecutive dates
3. Uses a clean, professional design suitable for reports
4. Includes a legend and explanatory note
5. Has clear month markers and labels
6. Uses appropriate spacing and typography for readability

The timeline can be downloaded and inserted directly into your report. Would you like any adjustments to the layout or information display?

<antArtifact identifier="vertical-timeline" type="image/svg+xml" title="BEIT Project Interview Timeline July-November 2024">
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 800 2000">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="2000" fill="white"/>
  
  <!-- Title -->
  <text x="400" y="40" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="24" font-weight="bold">BEIT Project Interview Timeline</text>
  <text x="400" y="70" text-anchor="middle" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="20">July - November 2024</text>

  <!-- Timeline line -->
  <line x1="100" y1="100" x2="100" y2="1900" stroke="#CBD5E1" stroke-width="2"/>

  <!-- July -->
  <g>
    <text x="50" y="120" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">July</text>
    <!-- July 7 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="150" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="155" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">July 7</text>
    <text x="220" y="155" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Basima Abdulrahman (KESK)</text>
    
    <!-- July 30 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="180" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="185" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">July 30</text>
    <text x="220" y="185" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Abdal Ghany (Grofin)</text>
  </g>

  <!-- August -->
  <g>
    <text x="50" y="240" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">August</text>
    
    <!-- Aug 8-11 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="270" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="275" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Aug 8-11</text>
    <text x="220" y="275" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Yousif Muayad (MoE)</text>
    <text x="220" y="295" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Kalyan Akkipeddi (ProtoVillage)</text>

    <!-- Aug 13 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="340" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="345" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Aug 13</text>
    <text x="220" y="345" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Mohammed Al-Samarrai (QAF)</text>
    <text x="220" y="365" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Zaid Al-Saffar (UNESCO)</text>
    <text x="220" y="385" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Abdullah Al Fakhrey (UoM)</text>

    <!-- Aug 14-28 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="450" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="455" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Aug 14-28</text>
    <text x="220" y="455" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Kozhin & Ghulan (Lafarge)</text>
    <text x="220" y="475" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Kamiran & Aeshah (Rwanga)</text>
    <text x="220" y="495" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Shwan Qaradaghi (51Labs)</text>
    <text x="220" y="515" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Dr. Basim (UoM)</text>
    <text x="220" y="535" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Ayyub Thinnuun (BTM)</text>
    <text x="220" y="555" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Mustafa Khalid (SIH)</text>
    <text x="220" y="575" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Sustainability Meetup</text>
    <text x="220" y="595" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Abdulla Thaier (MS)</text>
  </g>

  <!-- September -->
  <g>
    <text x="50" y="650" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">September</text>
    
    <circle cx="100" cy="680" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="685" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Sep 24</text>
    <text x="220" y="685" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Mohammed Ramahi (Sika)</text>
  </g>

  <!-- October -->
  <g>
    <text x="50" y="740" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">October</text>
    
    <!-- Oct 3-7 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="770" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="775" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Oct 3-7</text>
    <text x="220" y="775" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Hayder Al Samarray (ITC)</text>
    <text x="220" y="795" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Basima Abdulrahman (KESK)</text>

    <!-- Oct 23-25 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="840" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="845" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Oct 23-25</text>
    <text x="220" y="845" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Usama Ali (Sika)</text>
    <text x="220" y="865" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Mohammed & Rania (Kapita)</text>
    <text x="220" y="885" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Saad Alsaleh (ANoor)</text>
    <text x="220" y="905" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Ali Taher (MoB)</text>
    <text x="220" y="925" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Dawn Danby (Spherical)</text>
    <text x="220" y="945" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Dr. Samir (Usul)</text>

    <!-- Oct 27-31 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="990" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="995" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Oct 27-31</text>
    <text x="220" y="995" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Learning Planet Institute</text>
    <text x="220" y="1015" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Hanguin Safa (The Station)</text>
    <text x="220" y="1035" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Maryam Alfakhrey (QAF)</text>
  </g>

  <!-- November -->
  <g>
    <text x="50" y="1090" text-anchor="middle" fill="#475569" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold">November</text>
    
    <!-- Nov 2-3 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="1120" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="1125" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Nov 2-3</text>
    <text x="220" y="1125" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Sustainability Meetups</text>
    <text x="220" y="1145" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Dr. Firas (Sharikat Al Kahrabah)</text>

    <!-- Nov 6-11 -->
    <circle cx="100" cy="1190" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="120" y="1195" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Nov 6-11</text>
    <text x="220" y="1195" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Pre-Hackathon Sessions</text>
    <text x="220" y="1215" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Mohammad Alqatan (Mosul Solar)</text>
    <text x="220" y="1235" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Maryam Alfakhrey (QAF)</text>
    <text x="220" y="1255" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Aeshah Mohammed (Rwanga)</text>
    <text x="220" y="1275" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Abu Mahmoud</text>
    <text x="220" y="1295" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Dr. Basim (UoM)</text>
    <text x="220" y="1315" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Usama Ali & Mohammed (Sika)</text>
    <text x="220" y="1335" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">• Alnoor University Meetup</text>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(100, 1900)">
    <circle cx="10" cy="10" r="6" fill="#3B82F6"/>
    <text x="30" y="15" fill="#1E293B" font-family="Arial" font-size="14">Interview/Meeting</text>
  </g>
</svg>
</antArtifact>

I've created a vertical timeline that:
1. Organizes interviews chronologically from top to bottom
2. Groups by month with clear monthly headers
3. Uses bullet points for multiple interviews on the same dates
4. Provides ample space for text with no overlap
5. Maintains visual hierarchy with consistent spacing
6. Uses different text alignments for dates vs names/organizations
7. Includes all interview details clearly

The vertical layout solves our overlap issues while making the timeline easier to read and understand. Would you like any adjustments to the spacing, text size, or overall layout?
